snippet: Secretary of State John Kerry said that Prime Minister Recep Tayyip Erdogan had made “objectionable” remarks when he cast Zionism as a crime against humanity in comments at a United Nations meeting.
abstract: Secretary of State John Kerry chastises Turkish Prime Min Recep Tayyip Erdogan for calling Zionism 'crime against humanity,' comment that could frustrate Kerry's desire to see improvement in estranged Turkish-Israeli relations.
lead_paragraph: Secretary of State John Kerry said that Prime Minister Recep Tayyip Erdogan had made “objectionable” remarks when he cast Zionism as a crime against humanity in comments at a United Nations meeting.

headline.seo: Kerry Criticizes Turkish Prime Minister Over Zionism Remark
headline.main: Kerry Comes to Turkey With Rebuke of Its Leader Over Zionism Remark
headline.print_headline: Kerry Comes to Turkey With Rebuke of Its Leader Over Zionism Remark
